title: Chalice Cover, 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: grid of withdrawn element with needle lace, reticella style
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Center of cover is a woven square with an insertion of reticella. Around center piece are evenly spaced geometric motifs of reticella. Outer border has foliated forms and triangular pendants of reticella.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chalice Cover, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: linen
Technique: grid of withdrawn element with needle lace, reticella style. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-201.
